messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the requirement for the caster to bind a Hunting Horror?
The caster must succeed in an opposed POW roll to bind the Horror.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the alternative name for the deed of binding a Hunting Horror?
Deed of Murder.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the alternative name for the deed of binding a Nightgaunt?
Mastery of the Faceless Ones, The Elder Token by which They will Know You.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the alternative name for the deed of binding a Servitor Of The Outer Gods?
Pact of Wittering Madness.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the caster fails the opposed POW roll to bind a Horror?
The Horror succeeds in seizing the sacrifice.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of a bonus that can be gained to bind the Nightgaunt?
Mastery of the Faceless Ones
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the bonus gained to bind the Servitor Of The Outer Gods?
One bonus die
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the bonus that can be gained to bind the Star Vampire?
Vow of the Bloody Accord
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the Voorish Sign?
To benefit the casting of other spells, lessen the cost, reduce the casting time or increase the effect a little, depending on the spell in question.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is another name for the Voorish Sign?
The Sign of Power or Cunninge Pass.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much does the casting of the Voorish Sign cost?
1 magic point per stone.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does the casting of the Voorish Sign take?
5 rounds.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the alternative name for the Voorish Sign?
Sign of Power, Cunninge Pass.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cost of casting the Warding spell?
1 magic point per stone
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a stone is moved while casting the Wave of Oblivion spell?
The caster will be aware of the fact, even if asleep until then.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the volume of the wave created by the Wave of Oblivion spell?
3,000 cubic feet
